original_title: Belgrade Forest Incident …and What Happened to Mr. K?
overview: In 2018 the murder of Saudi journalist Jamal Khashoggi, referred to in the film as Mr. K,  captured the world’s attention as little by little, snippets of his fate became public. What started out as a mysterious disappearance at the Saudi consulate in Istanbul, slowly spiraled into an elaborate web of lies, and ultimately, a horrific murder. The news was particularly disturbing as it seemingly happened at the behest of Saudi Arabia’s crown prince, prompting many world leaders to step into the ring and voice their condemnation, including the US president, “Mr. T”.
title: Belgrade Forest Incident …and What Happened to Mr. K?
